Hi, I'm Maiko (here's [how to pronounce my name](https://namedrop.io/maikohata)). I created this blog as part of my [Educational Data Science](https://education.uoregon.edu/) specialization at the University of Oregon, where I am a doctorate student in educational leadership.

I also work as an Autism & Behavior Consultant at an outreach agency, [Early Childhood CARES](https://earlychildhoodcares.uoregon.edu/), in the College of Education. This role motivated me to learn more so I can better support infants and toddlers who experience Autism and/or Developmental Disability and their families.

For more information, please check out my [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/maikohata) page.

オレゴン大学博士課程（教育）に在籍している畑 麻衣子です。[Educational Data Science](https://education.uoregon.edu/)スペシャライゼーションの一環で、当サイトを作成しました。オレゴン大学[Early Childhood CARES](https://earlychildhoodcares.uoregon.edu/)にて、療育・自閉症のスペシャリストとして勤務しています。大阪高槻出身、大阪弁が恋しいです。
